summary: The module provides a suite of pytest unit tests that validate the Exodus file handling capabilities of the uxarray library, covering aspects such as data encoding, vertex initialization, mixed element support, file reading, and standardized data types and fill values.
business_intent: To guarantee accurate and robust processing of Exodus mesh files within uxarray, ensuring that scientific applications can reliably read, write, and manipulate mesh data with correct encoding, vertex handling, mixed element representation, and consistent data type conventions.
